thread.title: Beyonce Dressed Up as Storm From X-Men, and It Was Amazing
thread.title_full: Beyonce Dressed Up as Storm From X-Men, and It Was Amazing

author: TV Guide
title: Beyonce Dressed Up as Storm From X-Men, and It Was Amazing
text: Posted Oct. 25, 2015 at 6:08 PM Updated at 8:50 PM Posted Oct. 25, 2015 at 6:08 PM Updated at 8:50 PM Â» Social News Halloween is still about a week away, but Beyonce probably already won costume of the year. The singer dressed up as Storm from X-Men for Ciara 's birthday party on Saturday and completely nailed it. (Would you expect anything else?) As for the birthday girl Ciara, she dressed as Catwoman, while her boyfriend Russell Wilson went as Batman. Based on pictures from social media, Beyonce's former Destiny's Child bandmate Kelly Rowland also attended the party.
